title: MiROPA data disclosure schema
description: A JSON Schema for describing the data disclosure section for a MiROPA compliant a GDPR ROPA record.

name.description: Data protection authorities recommend that organisations list not only the recipients of data transfers outside the organisation but also the details of the internal groups or persons having access to the processingâ€™s data. (internal organizational unit, processor, third country partner,)

country_code.title: ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 Country code
country_code.description: A valid 2-digit ISO country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2), or, an array of valid ISO codes.

technical_safeguards.description: Technical data protection measures adopted for data transfer e.g. end-to-end encryption, certified transfer channel.

organisational_safeguards.description: Organisational data protection measures adopted for data transfer e.g. policies, staff training.)

legal_safeguards.description: Legal framework that acts as a safeguard for the transfer e.g. standard contractual clauses, Binding corporate rules, Country with an adequacy decision, Code of conduct, Certifications, Derogations (Article 49).

agreement.description: URL link to reach the agreements, this could be a contracts managements system or similar.
